content: Today, WellsFargo announced that they will report a record profit of 3billion dollars. The news sent the financials through the roof. Wells Fargo had a surge of over 30%!! Simple arithmetic will show how much money a 25billion dollar investment will reap. Maybe this is why the government did'nt ask Wells Fargo to take the money, they were basicaly told "You're taking the money."

title: Return on investment....Bailouts might not be so bad.

content: Some will pay back with interest, some will go under. The losses on the ones who go under will, most probably, not be covered by the "interest" payments. If they would, Wells Fargo would have bought the assets and generated a few percent on the cash flow. And when it is hundreds of billions , a couple of percent is big money.
